block_height.name: block-height
description: Returns the current block height of the blockchain as an unsigned integer.

examples.comment: Returns true if the current block-height has passed 1000 blocks.

burn_block_height.name: burn-block-height
description: Returns the current block height of the underlying burn blockchain as unsigned integer.

examples.comment: Returns true if the current height of the underlying burn blockchain has passed 1000 blocks.
